info.title: Game Start API
info.description: ### API para nuestro proyecto final de curso Api Evangelist, de la fundación APIAddicts

contact.name: Jacob de las Peñas | Marcos Carretero Poblete

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of consoles.
Admits *filters* to make the search more specific.

post.description: Register a new console with basic data.

get.description: Retrieves the console with the given identifier.

patch.description:
Updates the console with the given identifier.
Only the following fields are permitted:
* name
* brand
* state
* price
* launch_date
* resupply_date

delete.description: Deletes the console with the given identifier.

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of games.
Admits *filters* to make the search more specific.

post.description: Register a new game with basic data.

get.description: Retrieves the game with the given identifier.

patch.description:
Updates the game with the given identifier.
Only the following fields are permitted:
* name
* developer
* category
* PEGI
* parental_advisory
* number_of_players
* synopsis
* price
* state
* launch_date
* resupply_date

delete.description: Deletes the game with the given identifier.

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of sales.
Admits *filters* to make the search more specific.

post.description: Register a new sale with basic data.

get.description: Retrieves the sale with the given identifier.

patch.description:
Updates the sale with the given identifier.
Only the following fields are permitted:
* state
* sale_products
* delivery_date

delete.description: Deletes the sale with the given identifier.

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of returns.
Admits *filters* to make the search more specific.

post.description: Register a new return with basic data.

get.description: Retrieves the return with the given identifier.

patch.description:
Updates the return with the given identifier.
Only the following fields are permitted:
* state
* returned_products
* return_date

delete.description: Deletes the return with the given identifier.

limit_param.name: $limit
limit_param.description: Maximum number of registers per page.

select_param.name: $select
select_param.description: Array of the resource attributes to include in result.

exclude_param.name: $exclude
exclude_param.description: Array of resource attributes excluded in result.

name.description: Name of parameter causing the error

values.description: Array of explaining messages for error

items.example: You must declare a name while creating a new user

links.description: Hypermedia links to ease list navigation

location_header.description: URL of the newly created resource

_uuid.description: Identifier of the resource, in UUID v4 format

_console_launch_date.description: Date of the console's launch, ISO-8601 format

_console_resupply_date.description: Date of console's resupply, ISO-8601 format

_game_launch_date.description: Date of the game's launch, ISO-8601 format

_game_resupply_date.description: Date of game's resupply, ISO-8601 format

_number_of_players.description: How many players can play at the same time

_synopsis.example: The game follows a nameless knight, as they traverse an ancient, plague-infested kingdom inhabited by various insects, known as Hallownest.

_parental_advisory.description: Array of advisories for explicit content

example.name: FIFA 21
example.synopsis: FIFA 21 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts as part of the FIFA series.

_return_reason.example: The console I acquired does not work

patch_console.description: Request body with console properties to modify

patch_game.description: Request body with game properties to modify

patch_return.description: Request body with return properties to modify

patch_sale.description: Request body with sale properties to modify

console_list_response.description: Collection of consoles data obtained successfully

game_list_response.description: Collection of games data obtained successfully

return_list_response.description: Collection of returns data obtained successfully

sale_list_response.description: Collection of sales data obtained successfully

value.name: Fallout 5
value.synopsis: Fallout 4 is an action role-playing game. The player explores the game's dilapidated world, completes various quests, helps out factions, and acquires experience points to level up and increase the abilities of their character.

returned_products.name: FIFA 21
returned_products.synopsis: FIFA 21 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts as part of the FIFA series.
